data.description: StoneAgeVR is a fun playground game based around socializing and and hanging out with friends! Run around the maps and do all there is to-do from getting fancy cosmetics to getting your pants scared of in horror. Here at synaptic interactive we want our game to be as pollished as possible so you as the player can have the best cleanest experiance. We also take toxicity and moderation very seriusly and will ban anyone from the game breaking the code of conduct.

changelog.change_log: Valentines day patch + cosmetics!

Update: 2.03: Melting Point.

Explore in this new update the brand new Da Hood gamemode/map, with all new cosmetics to go with it! There have been a lot of optimizations to help everyone with a much smoother and overall better experience in stoneagevr.

With that welcome out new playermodel, it's more realistic and has much more potential than the old one.
fixing inventory and jetpack.
fixes jetpack
Servers back up. If you cant connect join the discord and let us know.
Hot fix for bugs.

Winter Wonderland Part 1

As the winter chill sets in, head to the shop for a snug hat or treat yourself to some steaming hot chocolate. If you're feeling adventurous, explore the mysterious black hole in the nearby valley; rumors hint at a journey to outer space, where an asteroid hovers on the edge of a supermassive black hole.

Major Notes.

- Added Astro Blast.

- Added Holiday cosmetics.

- Added Holiday decor.

- Removed Halloween Decor.

- Removed Corn Maze.

- Fixed private rooms.

Spooky season is finally here and things have gotten darker as the much requested night time has arrived along with huge optimizations for all the maps. 

There are also a new post processing setting for the computer and look forward to new settings for the computer in coming updates.

-Added Halloween back that will last for the month of October.
-Added Halloween decorations.
-Added new corn maze.
-Made things spooky.
-Fixed multiple lag issues.
Fixed horror monster
BASEMENT UPDATE :0

As you probably know, updates are slowing down, and will continue to do so. This because of multiple factors like, school and starting a new project. (want more on the new project? join the discord) 

The bugs in the game currently will probably not get fixed but, I hope you can still enjoy the game as much as I do.

On other notes, there is a new map. The Volcano. Run and do parkour to survive the ever rising lava and see how fast you can do it. There is also now player textures that you can buy in the shop to give your monkey new looks.

Thank you for your understanding and unwavering support.

Its late for me and I ran out of time. So the freezing issue is still there. Hope you all can still enjoy the game. Ill be back to fix this in 10 days so don't let the game die!

Patch nots: 1.6.1

- Optimized Valley Map.
- Fixed Strange Cave.
- Fix Map Loading.
- Fixed Bean eating sounds.

This new update is in preparation for things to come.
Go check out ChimpChaos and their new cosmetics in the shop! And while you checking that out look at the fancy pack for all those people who wanted to look quite exquisite!

Patch notes:
- lots of optimizing.
- added strange rocks.
- added fancy pack.
-added CC pack.
- Revamped caves.
-Fixed a lot of minor bugs.

The patch fixes a LOT of bugs. Here are the patch notes.
*Fixed cosmetic inventory
*FIxed equiping of the powers
*Fixed hand and cosmetics position
*Fixed multible smaller miscellanies
Dive into the new caves and climb rocks :) But before you go climb go get some of the climbing gear in the city! And make sure to go check out the new outfits shop in city with very cool outfits!

Update 1.4.9: 4th of july! (patch)

just fixed some stuff with purchasing currency and a few issues with cosmetics.
it's the 4th of july and the monkeys found some spare fireworks and cant get enough of them. But if your not into the big stuff you can buy a sparkler in the new limited time 4th of july shop!

Update 1.4.5 To Da Moon pt.2

I guess you could call this: To da Moon Part 2 but its mostly just fixed a bunch of bugs and added nighttime! If you cant see in dark places make sure to buy the flashlight in the shop.

Vines have been added to lighten up the place and are great for parkour. And make sure to buy the moon badge if you like da moon.

Update 1.4.0 To Da Moon!

The moon is finally back and it seems the monkeys made a moon base up there.

The Mystic Merchant is also in town selling some interesting cosmetics for very low prices.

also a lot of minor bug fixes.

also the moon is still being worked on so let me know if you run into any issues

Update 1.4.0: To Da Moon!

The moon is finally back and it seems the monkeys made a moon base up there.

The Mystic Merchant is also in town selling some interesting cosmetics for very low prices.

also a lot of minor bug fixes.
